.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.2.1 (2015-07-29)
---------------------

* Remove `Shipment.is_booked()` method. Use `Shipment.state` instead.
* Raise `ShipmentNotCompletedException` from `Shipment.track()` method

0.2.0 (2015-07-28)
---------------------

* Added support to track and cancel shipments

0.1.0 (2015-07-27)
---------------------

* First release on PyPI.
